name: SkiFy
description:
SkiFy is an open world flight simulator where you can explore
different biomes, collect objects and go through levels accompanied
by relaxing music.

You will be able to pilot various airplanes with different
characteristics, modes and much more. On the final version of
the game you will be able to play an authentic PRO flight mode.

Features:
-Variety of airplanes;
-Different maps to explore;
-Collectable (required for passing the level);
-Beautiful landscape and nature.
